thread.title: Check out the all-black uniforms Arizona State will wear vs. Colorado
thread.title_full: Check out the all-black uniforms Arizona State will wear vs. Colorado

author: First of Two October Meteor Showers to Peak Thursday
title: Check out the all-black uniforms Arizona State will wear vs. Colorado
text:
Check out the all-black uniforms Arizona State will wear vs. Colorado FOXSports 4 hrs ago © Mark J. Rebilas-USA TODAY Sports Sep 25, 2014; Tempe, AZ, USA; Arizona State Sun Devils quarterback Mike Bercovici (2) alongside injured quarterback Taylor Kelly on crutches prior to the game against the UCLA Bruins at Sun Devil Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Mark J. Rebilas-USA TODAY Sports Arizona State was recognized with the "freshest" uniforms of Week 5. Will they keep their fashion momentum strong vs. Colorado?
There's been a lot of questions about the uniform this week. here it is! #blackoutbuffs @adidasFballUS @FootballASU pic.twitter.com/nFyl1j7U56
— SunDevilEquipment (@SunDevilEquip) October 7, 2015 The Adidias uniforms are all-black, featuring the black and gold "oversize" pitchfork helmet. ASU's equipment staff tweeted out the uniforms here . The staff also included special photos of the black helmets that both ASU and Colorado will wear during the game; available here .
Colorado lid up ready to roll pic.twitter.com/S3z0kpp5y3
— SunDevilEquipment (@SunDevilEquip) October 7, 2015 Arizona State coaches will rock matching black sideline shoes with bold yellow stripes.
Coaches sideline shoe has to match! #attentiontodetails pic.twitter.com/yywY4WRphp
— SunDevilEquipment (@SunDevilEquip) October 7, 2015 (h/t Sun Devil Equipment )
